identificationModule.briefTitle: SNUH MICU Cohort Study of PICS
identificationModule.officialTitle: Cohort Study of Patients Patients in the Medical Intensive Care Unit to Evaluate Postintensive Care Sydnrome

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Prospective registry of patients admitted to the medical intensive care unit Patients discharged are followed up to 5 years after discharge

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients admitted to the medical intensive care unit

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients admitted to the intensive care unit for simple procedures
* Patients admitted for postoperative care observation
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Adult patients admitted to the medical intensive care unit
